title: Murder in the US - number of victims by weapon 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon Used in the x axis and Number of murder victims in the y axis.
The Number of murder victims is highest at Weapon Used Handguns and lowest at Weapon Used Explosives.
There is a difference of 6599.0 between the maximum Weapon Used Handguns and minimum Weapon Used Explosives.
min_summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Weapon Used, and Number of murder victims in each Weapon Used on the y axis.
The Number of murder victims is highest at Weapon Used Handguns and lowest at Weapon Used Explosives.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon Used in the x axis and Number of murder victims in the y axis.
The Number of murder victims is highest at Weapon Used Handguns and lowest at Weapon Used Explosives.
There is a difference of 6599.0 between the maximum Weapon Used Handguns and minimum Weapon Used Explosives.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon Used in the x axis and Number of murder victims in the y axis.
The Number of murder victims is highest at Weapon Used Handguns and lowest at Weapon Used Explosives.
Second maximum Number of murder victims is found at Weapon Used Firearms type not stated.
The difference of Number of murder victims between the highest and lowest Weapon Used is 6599.0.
The Weapon Used Handguns has the highest Number of murder victims, followed by Firearms type not stated, and Knives or cutting instruments. Down to the Weapon Used Explosives which is the lowest.
The lowest value 4.0 at Explosives is almost 7.48 times smaller than the average value 882.69.

data.Weapon Used: Other weapons or weapons not stated
